nodes.text: A seating rack was a device designed for the Quor'sav to perch upon. It looked similar to a normal chair, but altered for bird-like beings who did not sit on their posteriors like humanoids. In 4 BBY, Lando Calrissian and his partner Vuffi Raa installed such a device aboard the Millennium Falcon for use by the Quor'sav police officer Waywa Fybot. For sleeping, the Quor'sav utilized a resting rack.
